PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

nodes.body:
I added some optional golf suggestions. Also, please add a docstring to `lemma isTotallyDisconnected_iff_lt`.

Otherwise LGTM. Thanks!

bors d+

:v: fpvandoorn can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8737318614/job/23974035050)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8737318614/job/23974034758)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8737318614/job/23974035658)

:golfing:
```suggestion
lemma ordConnected_inter_Icc_of_subset (h : Ioo x y ⊆ s) : OrdConnected (s ∩ Icc x y) :=
  ordConnected_of_Ioo fun _u ⟨_, hu, _⟩ _v ⟨_, _, hv⟩ _ ↦
    (Ioo_subset_Ioo hu hv).trans <| subset_inter h (Ioo_subset_Icc_self)
```

:golfing: 
```suggestion
  refine ⟨fun h ↦ Ioo_subset_Icc_self.trans fun z hz ↦ ?_, ordConnected_inter_Icc_of_subset⟩
  have hxy : x ≤ y := hz.1.trans hz.2
  exact h.out ⟨hx, left_mem_Icc.2 hxy⟩ ⟨hy, right_mem_Icc.2 hxy⟩ hz |>.1
```

```suggestion
  simp_rw [IsTotallyDisconnected, isPreconnected_iff_ordConnected, ← not_nontrivial_iff,
    nontrivial_iff_exists_lt]
  refine ⟨fun h x hx y hy hxy ↦ ?_, fun h t hts ht ⟨x, hx, y, hy, hxy⟩ ↦ ?_⟩
  · simp_rw [← mem_Ioo, ← not_ordConnected_inter_Icc_iff hx hy]
    refine fun hs ↦ h _ (inter_subset_left _ _) hs ?_
    exact ⟨x, ⟨hx, le_rfl, hxy.le⟩, y, ⟨hy, hxy.le, le_rfl⟩, hxy⟩
  · obtain ⟨z, h1z, h2z⟩ := h x (hts hx) y (hts hy) hxy
    exact h1z <| hts <| ht.1 hx hy ⟨h2z.1.le, h2z.2.le⟩
```
